# Social Media Relay Agent - Cron Schedule
# Generated by Admin Panel
# Note: Scripts use random delays between min-max values from .env

# Facebook Scraper - Runs every 45 minutes (minimum interval)
*/45 * * * * /bin/bash /var/www/scrapper-alexis/run_facebook_flow.sh >> /var/www/scrapper-alexis/logs/cron_facebook.log 2>&1

# Twitter Poster + Image Generator - Runs every 1 minutes (minimum interval)
*/1 * * * * /bin/bash /var/www/scrapper-alexis/run_twitter_flow.sh >> /var/www/scrapper-alexis/logs/cron_twitter.log 2>&1
